casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 763
EAST LAMPETER TOWNSHIP, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE HORSE RACING COMMISSION, Appellee. Penn National Turf Club, Inc., Intervenor. LANCASTER COUNTY PENNSYLVANIANS AGAINST GAMBLING EXPANSION v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE HORSE RACING COMMISSION and Penn National Turf Club, Inc., Intervenor. Appeal of EAST LAMPETER TOWNSHIP.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 17, 1998.
Decided Dec. 14, 1998.
Elizabeth A. Hambrick-Stowe, Lancaster, for East Lampeter Tp.
Jorge M. Augusto, Asst. Counsel, for Dept. of Agriculture, State Horse Racing Com’n.
Bradley K. Moss, Philadelphia,for Intervenor-Penn Nat. Turf Club.
Robert S. Trigg, Lancaster, for PA Against Gambling Expansion.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
